SA15dhkvadnu:10: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units, although they
SA15dhkvadnu:11: involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words are
SA15dhkvadnu:12: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
SA15dhkvadnu:13: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
SA15dhkvadnu:15: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to
SA15dhkvadnu:17: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes
SA15dhkvadnu:18: making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided, and terms
SA15dhkvadnu:19: such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
SA15dhkvadnu:20: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta fundamentally
SA15dhkvadnu:22: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the
SA15dhkvadnu:23: wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya, tadutpatti,
SA15dhkvadnu:24: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
SA15dhkvadnu:25: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
SA15dhkvadnu:26: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
SA15dhkvadnu:29: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example, -d
SA15dhkvadnu:30: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of
SA15dhkvadnu:31: using this database to make an KWIC index.

SA15dhkvadnu:320: na ca śakteḥ śakty-ātmani prādurbhāva iti tasyāḥ svātmano
SA15dhkvadnu:322: etena pariṇāmaḥ pratyuktaḥ, yo api hi kalpayet, yo yasya
SA15dhkvadnu:323: pariṇāmaḥ, sa tasmād abhinna iti, na hi śakter ātma-apariṇāma
SA15dhkvadnu:324: iti, kiṃ ca idam uktaṃ bhavati pariṇāma iti. avasthitasya
SA15dhkvadnu:326: ca pariṇāmaḥ yat tad dharma-antaraṃ nivartate
SA15dhkvadnu:327: prādurbhavati ca, kiṃ tat tad eva avasthitaṃ dravyaṃ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:329: yadi tat tad eva, tasya avasthānaṃ na nivṛtti-prādurbhāvāv
SA15dhkvadnu:330: iti kasya tāv iti vaktavyam. avasthitasya dharma-antaram iti
SA15dhkvadnu:331: ca na sidhyati. na hi tad eva tasya anapāśrita-vyapekṣa-abhedaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:333: atha dravyād artha-antaraṃ dharmaḥ, tadā tasya nivṛtti-
SA15dhkvadnu:334: prādurbhāvābhyāṃ na dravyasya pariṇatiḥ. na hy artha-antaragatābhyāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:337: dravyasya dharma iti ca vyapadeśo na sidhyati sambandha-
SA15dhkvadnu:338: abhāvāt. na hi kāryakāraṇabhāvād anyo vastu-sambandho
SA15dhkvadnu:339: asti. na ca anayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ, svayam atadātmano
SA15dhkvadnu:342: kāryasya utpādanād dravyasya pariṇāma iti iṣṭaṃ syāt. tad aviruddham
SA15dhkvadnu:345: kāryasya utpattau mṛd-dravyaṃ pariṇatam iti vyavahārasya upagamāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:346: na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyām anyo
SA15dhkvadnu:347: vikalpaḥ sambhavati, ubhayathā api na pariṇāmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:348: na nirvivekaṃ dravyam eva dharmaḥ, na api dravyād
SA15dhkvadnu:349: artha-antaram, kiṃ tarhi, dravyasya saṃniveśo avasthā-antaram,
SA15dhkvadnu:350: yathā aṅgulīnāṃ muṣṭiḥ. na hy aṅguly eva nirvivekā muṣṭiḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:351: prasāritānām amuṣṭitvāt, na apy artha-antaram, pṛthak-svabhāvena
SA15dhkvadnu:352: anupalabdher iti cet, na, muṣṭer aṅguli-viśeṣatvāt. aṅgulya
SA15dhkvadnu:353: eva hi kāścin muṣṭiḥ, na sarvāḥ. na hi prasāritā aṅgulyo
SA15dhkvadnu:355: pratipatti-prasaṅgāt. ya eva hi khalu vivekaḥ svabhāvabhūtaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:357: ca viveka-utpāde aṅgulyaḥ prasāritā eva upalabhyeran, na hi
SA15dhkvadnu:360: nanu uktaṃ na dravyam eva nirvivekam avasthā, na api
SA15dhkvadnu:361: dravyād artha-antaram iti. uktam idam, na punar yuktam, na
SA15dhkvadnu:362: hi sato vastunas tattvānyatve muktvā anyaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavanti,
SA15dhkvadnu:365: pratikṣaṇa-vināśinīṣv anyā eva prasāritāḥ, anyā muṣṭiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:367: viṣayaḥ, bīja-aṅkura-ādi-śabda-vat vrīhy-ādi-śabda-vac ca. tena aṅgulyaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:369: tad yadi prāg asad eva kāraṇe kāryaṃ bhavet, kiṃ na
SA15dhkvadnu:370: sarvaḥ sarvasmād bhavati. na hy asattve kaścid viśeṣa iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:371: nanu sarvatra sarvasya sattve apy ayaṃ tulyo doṣaḥ. na hi
SA15dhkvadnu:372: sattve kaścid viśeṣaḥ. viśeṣe vā sa viśeṣas traiguṇyād
SA15dhkvadnu:373: bhinnaḥ syāt, tadbhāve viśeṣasya ananvayāt. sataś ca sarvātmanā
SA15dhkvadnu:375: ca, sādhyasya kasyacid abhāvāt yasya kasyacid atiśayasya
SA15dhkvadnu:376: tatra kathaṃcid asata utpattau, so atiśayas tatra asan
SA15dhkvadnu:377: kathaṃ jāyate. jātau vā sarvaḥ sarvasmāj jāyeta iti tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:378: na atiśayas tatra sarvathā na asti, kathaṃcit sata eva bhāvād
SA15dhkvadnu:379: iti cet, yathā na asti, sa prakāras tatra asan kathaṃ jāyeta.
SA15dhkvadnu:380: na ca sarvathā sataḥ kaścij janma-artha ity uktam.
SA15dhkvadnu:381: asato api kāryasya kāraṇād utpāde, yo yaj-janana-svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:382: tata eva tasya janma, na anyasmād iti niyamaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:383: tasya api sa svabhāva-niyamaḥ sva-hetor ity anādi-bhāva-svabhāva-
SA15dhkvadnu:385: api ca, yadi mṛt-piṇḍe ghaṭo asti, kathaṃ tad-avasthāyāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:386: na paścād-vad upalabdhiḥ, tad-arthakriyā vā. vyakter aprādurbhāvād
SA15dhkvadnu:387: iti cet, tasya eva tad-arthakriyā-ādi-bhāve ghaṭatvāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:388: tad-rūpasya ca prāg asattvāt, kathaṃ ghaṭo asti. na hi rūpa-antarasya
SA15dhkvadnu:389: sattve rūpa-antaram asti. na ca rūpa-pratibhāsa-bhede vastv-
SA15dhkvadnu:392: sa na asty eva. na hi tasya tat-svabhāva-sthitāv anupalabdhiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:403: viruddha-upalabdhiṣv api dvayor viruddhayor ekasya viruddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:408: athavā sādhyate tena pareṣām apratīto artha iti sādhanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:410: ādi-vacanam. tasya ekasya apy avacanam asādhana-aṅga-vacanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:411: tad api vādino nigrahasthānam tad-avacane hetu-rūpasya
SA15dhkvadnu:413: athavā tasya eva sādhanasya yan na aṅgaṃ pratijñā-upanaya-
SA15dhkvadnu:417: ca sādhana-prayoga ekasya eva abhidhānena siddher bhāvāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:418: dvitīyasya asāmarthyam iti tasya apy asādhana-aṅgasya abhidhānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:421: apy upadeyam eva. na, vaiyarthyāt. asaty api pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:422: vacane yathoktāt sādhana-vākyād bhavaty eva iṣṭa-artha-siddhir
SA15dhkvadnu:423: ity apārthakaṃ tasya upādānam. yadi ca viṣaya-upadarśanam
SA15dhkvadnu:424: antareṇa pratīter anutpattiḥ, kathaṃ na pratijñā sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:425: avayavaḥ. na hi pakṣa-dharma-ādi-vacanasya api pratīti-hetu-
SA15dhkvadnu:426: bhāvād anyaḥ sādhana-arthaḥ. sa pratijñā-vacane api tulya iti
SA15dhkvadnu:428: kevalasya asāmarthyād asādhanatvam iti cet, tat tulyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:429: pakṣa-dharma-vacanasya api iti tad api na sādhana-avayavaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:430: na hi pakṣa-dharma-vacanāt kevalāt pratipatter utpattiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:435: athavā sādhanasya siddher yan na aṅgam asiddho viruddho
SA15dhkvadnu:436: anaikāntiko vā hetvābhāsaḥ. tasya api vacanaṃ vādino
SA15dhkvadnu:439: dṛṣṭāntābhāsasya asādhana-aṅgasya vacanam api vādino nigrahasthānam,
SA15dhkvadnu:440: asamartha-upādānād eva. na hi tair hetoḥ sambandhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:442: athavā siddhiḥ sādhanam tad-aṅgaṃ dharmo yasya arthasya
SA15dhkvadnu:444: tad-vyatirekeṇa aparasya apy ajijñāsitasya viśeṣasya śāstra-āśraya-
SA15dhkvadnu:450: yeṣa panna-ādinā bahiḥ prativādinaḥ prāśnikānāṃ ca
SA15dhkvadnu:451: nyāyadarśinām iti. ebhiḥ kathā-viccheda eva karaṇīyaḥ, na
SA15dhkvadnu:452: hi kaścid arthaḥ kvacit kriyamāṇa-prasaṅge na prayujyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:453: nairātmyavādinas tu tat-sādhane nṛtya-gīty-āder api tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:455: yathā pratijñā-abhidhāna-pūrvakaṃ kaścit kuryāt. na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:456: ātmā iti vayaṃ bauddhā brūmaḥ. ke bauddhāḥ. ye buddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:457: bhagavataḥ śāsanam abhyupagatāḥ. ko buddho bhagavān.
SA15dhkvadnu:458: yasya śāsane bhadanta-aśvaghoṣaḥ pravrajitaḥ. kaḥ punar
SA15dhkvadnu:460: kīdṛśaṃ rāṣṭra-pālaṃ nāma nāṭakam iti prasaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
SA15dhkvadnu:461: nāndyante tataḥ praviśati sūtradhāra iti paṭhen nṛtyed
SA15dhkvadnu:462: gāyec ca. prativādī taṃ ca sarva-prasaṅgaṃ na anukartuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:465: na ca evaṃ prastutasya paryavasānaṃ sambhavati, aniścaya-
SA15dhkvadnu:467: kathaṃ ca evaṃ jaya-parājayau, prativādino apy ananubhāṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:469: vyājena sambhavād aniścitatvāc ca. tasmāt pratijñā-vacanam
SA15dhkvadnu:470: eva tāvan na nyāyyam. kutaḥ punar tatra ajijñāsita-
SA15dhkvadnu:472: ca. sarvaś ca ayaṃ prakāro durmatibhiḥ śaṭhair nyāya-sāmarthyena
SA15dhkvadnu:476: ghoṣaṇam, nityaḥ śabdo anityo vā iti vāde dvādaśa-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:484: iti cet, anyasya apy ajijñāsitasya kiṃ na bhavati. na hi
SA15dhkvadnu:487: ādi-siddhim antareṇa na anityatā-siddhiḥ, tathāvidhas tu
SA15dhkvadnu:488: dharmaḥ pṛthag anukto api sādhya-dharme antarbhāvāt pakṣīkṛta
SA15dhkvadnu:489: eva iti na pṛthag asya upanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā. tasmād
SA15dhkvadnu:490: evaṃvidhasya api tadānīṃ prativādinā ajijñāsitasya arthasya
SA15dhkvadnu:491: pratijñāyām anyatra vā upanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā artha-antara-
SA15dhkvadnu:493: eva sādhana-aṅgaṃ vācyam. na prasaṅga upakṣeptavyaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:496: tathābhāve pratipādite, anyathā dvayor ekasya api
SA15dhkvadnu:499: sādhane prayukte abhyupagata-uttara-pakṣo yatra viṣaye prativādī
SA15dhkvadnu:500: yadā na doṣam udbhāvayati tadā parājito vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:503: aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭānta-doṣaś ca. teṣām anudbhāvanam apratyāyanam
SA15dhkvadnu:505: tat punaḥ sādhanasya nirdoṣatvāt, sadoṣatve api prativādino
SA15dhkvadnu:506: ajñānāt pratipādana-asāmarthyād vā. na hi duṣṭa-sādhana-abhidhāne
SA15dhkvadnu:507: api vādinaḥ prativādino apratipādite doṣe parājaya-
SA15dhkvadnu:510: bhūta-pratipatter abhāvād apratipādakasya jayo api na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:511: eva. na hi tattva-cintāyāṃ kaścic chala-vyavahāraḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:512: yady evaṃ kiṃ na parājayaḥ, tattva-siddhi-bhraṃśāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:513: na anirākaraṇāt. nirākaraṇaṃ hi tasya anyena parājayaḥ, na
SA15dhkvadnu:515: sādhana-abhāve asaty api pratiyogini bhāvāt. pratiyoginaś ca
SA15dhkvadnu:519: chala-vyavahāre api vijigīṣūṇāṃ vāda iti cet, na, durjana-
SA15dhkvadnu:520: vipratipatty-adhikāre satāṃ śāstra-pravṛtteḥ. na hi para-anugraha-
SA15dhkvadnu:522: ādīn asad-vyavahārān upadiśanti. na ca para-vipaṃsanena
SA15dhkvadnu:523: lābha-satkāra-śloka-upārjanaṃ satām ācāraḥ. na api tathā-pravṛttebhyaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:526: sadbhir lābha-ādy-upārjanāya praṇīyante. tasmān na yoga-vihitaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:527: kaścid vijigīṣu-vādo nāma. para-anugraha-pravṛttās tu santo
SA15dhkvadnu:530: tasya eva anuprabodhāya. tad eva nyāya-anusaraṇaṃ satāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:531: vādaḥ, ukta-nyāye tattva-arthī cet pratipadyeta, tad-apratipattāv
SA15dhkvadnu:535: api iti vaktavyam. tasmān na jyāyān ayaṃ tattva-rakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:538: para-upatāpa-vidhāne api tattva-apratiṣṭhāpanāt. anyathā api nyāya-
SA15dhkvadnu:542: athavā yo na doṣaḥ sādhanasya tad-bhāve api vādinā sādhayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:543: iṣṭasya arthasya siddher vighāta-abhāvāt, tasya udbhāvanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:545: yathā sādhyatayā aniṣṭo api vādino dharmaḥ, śāstra-upagamāt
SA15dhkvadnu:546: sādhya iti tad-viparyāsena virodha-udbhāvanam. na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:547: ātmā iti tava pratijñā-padayor virodha iti pratijñā-doṣa-udbhāvanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:551: jāty-uttarāṇi ity evam-āder doṣasya udbhāvanam adoṣa-udbhāvanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:552: tasya vādinā doṣa-ābhāsatve prakhyāpite prativādī parājito
SA15dhkvadnu:554: punaḥ sādhane na dvayor ekasya api jaya-parājayau, tattva-
SA15dhkvadnu:557: tasmāj jigīṣatā sva-pakṣaś ca sthāpanīyaḥ para-pakṣaś ca
SA15dhkvadnu:558: nirākartavyaḥ. nirdoṣe sādhana-abhidhāne api vādinaḥ prativādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:560: jaya-parājayau, na anyathā, bhāvatas tattva-abhidhāne api pratipakṣa-
SA15dhkvadnu:562: prativādino apy atra, bhāvato mithyā-pratipatter iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:564: anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:565: yatra idaṃ yathoktaṃ nigrahasthāna-lakṣaṇaṃ na asti tasya
SA15dhkvadnu:566: nigrahasthānatvam ayuktam iti na uktam asmābhiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:568: nigrahasthānam iti atra bhāṣyakāra-mataṃ dūṣayitvā vārttikakāro
SA15dhkvadnu:569: ayaṃ sthita-pakṣam āha. tam eva brūmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:570: pratidṛṣṭāntasya yo dharmas taṃ yadā sva-dṛṣṭānte
SA15dhkvadnu:571: abhyanujānāti nigṛhīto veditavyaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭaś ca asāv ante ca
SA15dhkvadnu:572: vyavasthita iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. sva-dṛṣṭāntaḥ sva-pakṣaḥ, pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:574: abhyanujānan parājitaḥ, yathā anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:575: iti brūvan pratipakṣa-vādini sāmānyena pratyavasthite āha
SA15dhkvadnu:576: yadi sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo apy evam astv iti
SA15dhkvadnu:580: kiṃ kṛto anena prakāreṇa pratijñāṃ tyajataḥ pratijñāhānir
SA15dhkvadnu:581: iti. sambhavati hy anyena api prakāreṇa hetu-doṣa-udbhāvana-
SA15dhkvadnu:583: para-pakṣa-upagamaś ca. idam eva ca pratijñāhāneḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:584: pradhānaṃ nimittam evaṃ pratipāditena pratijñā hātavyā
SA15dhkvadnu:586: idaṃ punar asambaddham eva sāmānyaṃ nityam aindriyakam
SA15dhkvadnu:587: ity ukte śabdo apy evam astv iti. kaḥ svastha-ātmā svayam
SA15dhkvadnu:588: aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad iti bruvan sāmānyena
SA15dhkvadnu:590: sāmānyasya api nityasya aindriyakatve apy anitye ghaṭe darśanāt
SA15dhkvadnu:592: jāḍyāt pratipadyeta api iti cet, tathā api kiṃ sāmānyasya upadarśanena.
SA15dhkvadnu:593: evam eva nityaḥ śabda iti vaktavyaṃ jaḍasya
SA15dhkvadnu:595: na ca nitya-sāmānya-upadarśanena tad-dharmaṃ śabde pratipadyamāne
SA15dhkvadnu:597: śabda iti ca vadato nityaḥ śabda ity āñjasaḥ pratipakṣaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:603: pratijñā-antaram pratijñāto artho anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:607: ghaṭo asarvagato anitya eva śabdo apy asarvagato anitya
SA15dhkvadnu:608: iti. etat pratijñā-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ sādhana-sāmarthye
SA15dhkvadnu:609: apy aparijñānāt. sa hi pūrvasyā anityaḥ śabda iti
SA15dhkvadnu:610: pratijñāyāḥ sādhanāya uttarām asarvagataḥ śabda iti pratijñām
SA15dhkvadnu:611: āha. tad-darśanāya tad-artha-nirdeśa ity āha. tad-arthaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:613: nirdeśaḥ. na ca pratijñā pratijñā-antara-sādhane samarthā
SA15dhkvadnu:615: atra api na evam-bruvatā pratijñā-antaraṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:616: uktaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi viśeṣaṇam aindriyakatvasya
SA15dhkvadnu:617: hetoḥ sāmānye vṛttyā vyabhicāra udbhāvite asarvagatatve
SA15dhkvadnu:619: pariharati. na punaḥ pratijñā-antaram āha, asarvagatatvasya
SA15dhkvadnu:621: yad apy uktaṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya uttarāṃ pratijñām
SA15dhkvadnu:622: āha iti tad apy ayuktam. na hi pratijñā pratijñā-sādhanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:623: ucyamānā pratijñā-antaraṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi hetv-āder ananyatamaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:625: syān na sādhya-nirdeśaḥ. udāharaṇa-sādharmya-ādeś ca hetu-lakṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:626: asarvagatve bhāvāt pratijñā-lakṣaṇasya ca abhāvāt, hetutvam
SA15dhkvadnu:628: asambaddhaṃ ca idaṃ pratijñāṃ pratijñā-sādhanāya āha iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:629: yo hi prāk pratijñām uktvā hetu-udāharaṇa-ādikaṃ vaktuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:630: jānāti, sa kiṃcid anukramaṃ sādhanasya jānāty eva hi, jānan
SA15dhkvadnu:632: upādadīta. upādadatā ca anena pratijñā-mātreṇa siddhir
SA15dhkvadnu:633: iṣṭā bhavati, tataś ca na prāg api hetuṃ brūyāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:635: aśakyatvāt, lakṣaṇa-niyamo apy asambaddha eva pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:638: ekam eva lakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ syāt. na ca evaṃvidhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:639: kaścid vivādeṣu dṛṣṭa-pūrvo vyavahāro yena tad-arthaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:640: yatnaḥ kriyate. na ca bāla-pralāpa-anudiśya śāstraṃ pravartate
SA15dhkvadnu:641: pravṛttau ca kā niṣṭhā teṣām aniṣṭānāt. dṛśyate ca
SA15dhkvadnu:642: viduṣām api na atinirūpaṇād asiddha-abhidhānam iti. vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:644: tasmād iha api yadi nivṛtta-ākāṅkṣe vādini paro anaikāntikatām
SA15dhkvadnu:646: nigrahasthānaṃ vādinaḥ, evaṃ yadi prativādī sat sāmānyam
SA15dhkvadnu:649: eṣām arthānām apratipādane na bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvanam iti
SA15dhkvadnu:650: na kaścit parājayo abhyupagama-mātreṇa vastu-siddher abhāvāt
SA15dhkvadnu:652: sādhana-abhidhānāt tu jetā api na bhavati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:653: anitya-ākāṅkṣe punar vādini na kaścid doṣo viśeṣaṇa-abhidhānena
SA15dhkvadnu:656: dravyam iti pratijñā, rūpa-ādibhyo artha-antarasya anupalabdher
SA15dhkvadnu:657: iti hetuḥ, so ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ. etena
SA15dhkvadnu:658: eva pratijñā-virodho apy ukto yatra pratijñā sva-vacanena
SA15dhkvadnu:659: virudhyate, yathā śramaṇā garbhiṇī, na asty ātmā iti vā, hetu-
SA15dhkvadnu:660: virodho api yatra pratijñayā hetur virudhyate, yathā sarvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:661: pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti. etena pratijñayā
SA15dhkvadnu:662: dṛṣṭānta-virodho api vyākhyātaḥ. hetoś ca dṛṣṭānta-ādibhir
SA15dhkvadnu:665: virodhaḥ, yaḥ para-pakṣaṃ sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā vyabhicārayati,
SA15dhkvadnu:667: ca, yaś ca sva-pakṣa-anapekṣaṃ hetuṃ prayuṅkte
SA15dhkvadnu:668: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād iti, tasya sva-siddhasya gotva-āder
SA15dhkvadnu:673: tad-āśrayas tat-kṛto vā hetu-dṛṣṭāntayor na virodha iti na pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:675: syād etat, asaty api pratijñā-prayoge gamyamāno api pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:676: hetvor virodho bhavati, yathā rūpa-ādibhyo artha-antarasya anupalabdhiḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:677: tad guṇa-vyatiriktam, na upalabhyate ca rūpa-ādibhyo
SA15dhkvadnu:678: artha-antaraṃ dravyam ity ukte api gamyata eva sādhya-
SA15dhkvadnu:681: satyam, syād ayaṃ virodhaḥ, yadi hetuḥ sādhya-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:684: pratibhāsa-anupalabdhiḥ, tat tad-vyatirekeṇa na asti iti iṣṭa-vyatireka-
SA15dhkvadnu:685: viparyaya-sādhanād viruddho hetur asmābhir ukta eva iti
SA15dhkvadnu:686: bhavaty eva idaṃ nigraha-adhikaraṇam, yady evaṃvidhaḥ pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:687: hetvor virodha iṣṭaḥ. atha punar asya upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:688: prāptir lupyate, tadā na kaścit pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:689: vyatiriktānām api bhāvānāṃ kutaścid viprakarṣiṇāṃ tad-
SA15dhkvadnu:692: iti tatra idam eva nigraha-adhikaraṇam asādhana-aṅga-
SA15dhkvadnu:693: bhūtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ sādhana-vākye prayogaḥ; na virodhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:694: tad-adhikaraṇatvāt. yadi pratijñā-anapekṣo virodhaḥ syāt, syāt
SA15dhkvadnu:698: ye tu kecid vicāra-prasaṅgeṣv ekatra sādhye bahavo
SA15dhkvadnu:700: vṛtteḥ sāmarthyam anyathā dvitīyasya vaiyarthyāt. yadi hi
SA15dhkvadnu:701: tatra apy eka-prayogam antareṇa aparasya prayogo na sambhavet,
SA15dhkvadnu:702: na tadā dvitīyasya kaścit sādhana-arthaḥ pratīta-pratipādana-
SA15dhkvadnu:703: abhāvāt. tasmān na pratijñāyāḥ sva-vacana-virodho nāma
SA15dhkvadnu:705: na ca na asty ātmā ity atra kaścit pratijñā-virodhaḥ na asty ātma-
SA15dhkvadnu:707: hi virodhaḥ syāt. na ca sva-lakṣaṇaṃ śabdārtha iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:708: yaḥ punaḥ pratijñayā bādhanād hetu-virodha uktaḥ, yathā
SA15dhkvadnu:709: sarvaṃ pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti, na atra
SA15dhkvadnu:710: pratijñāyāḥ prayogaḥ, na api hetor, yena virodhaḥ syāt, kiṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:716: iti brūyāt. etena tad-virodhaḥ pratyuktaḥ. dṛṣṭānta-upadarśanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:717: ca etad anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka-anityatvād iti yathā. kvacid
SA15dhkvadnu:721: yadi dṛṣṭānta-prayogaḥ kiṃ ṛjunā eva tat-prayoga-krameṇa
SA15dhkvadnu:722: na prayukto vipratipatti-viṣayaś ca kiṃ na darśita iti cet, na,
SA15dhkvadnu:724: ca. ata eva na pratijñayā hetor bādhanam. na ca ekam
SA15dhkvadnu:725: eva kiṃcin na asti iti bruvāṇaḥ kaścit tat-samuccaya-rūpam
SA15dhkvadnu:726: ekaṃ samūham icchati yena virodhaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:727: yo api yugapat ṣaṭkena yogād ity ādinā paramāṇor
SA15dhkvadnu:728: bhedam āha, na tasya apy ekaḥ samuccaya-rūpaḥ sādhayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:729: iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tarhy abhāva eva eka-aneka-pratiṣedhāt. ataḥ so api
SA15dhkvadnu:730: na samūhas tasya iṣṭaḥ, na tatra śabda iti na virodhaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:731: na virodho ayaṃ pūrvakāt pratijñā-hetu-virodhāt bhidyate
SA15dhkvadnu:732: yena pṛthag ucyeta. tatra hetu-pratijñāyor bādhanam, iha
SA15dhkvadnu:733: pratijñayā hetor ity asti bheda iti cet, artha-virodhe hi hetu-
SA15dhkvadnu:735: dviṣv ity api parasparaṃ bādhakam eka-artha-saṃnidhāv apara-
SA15dhkvadnu:738: api ca ayaṃ viruddho aviruddho vā sati hetu-prayoge vyadhikaraṇatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:740: sa khalu ucyamāna eva atad-dharmatayā pratīto vaktuḥ parājayam
SA15dhkvadnu:743: api ca sarvatra ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ sambhavan
SA15dhkvadnu:744: na dvayīṃ hetu-doṣa-jātim atipatati viruddhatām asiddhatāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:745: ca iti. viruddhatā siddhe hetor dharmiṇi bhāve sādhya-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:748: ekatra asambhavāt. na ca anyathā virodhaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:750: virodhād virodha-sambhava iti cet, apramāṇa-yoge tu ubhayor
SA15dhkvadnu:751: dharmiṇi saṃśayaḥ. tathā sati hetor dharmiṇi bhāva-saṃśaye
SA15dhkvadnu:752: asiddhatā eva hetu-doṣa ity asiddha-viruddhābhyām anyo
SA15dhkvadnu:753: na pratijñayā virodho nāma parājaya-hetuḥ. asiddha-viruddhe
SA15dhkvadnu:754: ca hetv-ābhāsa-vacanād eva ukta iti na pṛthak pratijñā-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:757: cet, syād etat pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti pratijñā-hetū āśritya
SA15dhkvadnu:758: ubhaya-āśrayo bhavati. tatra yadā pratijñā-virodho vivakṣitas
SA15dhkvadnu:759: tadā pratijñā-virodha iti ucyate, yadā pratijñāyā hetor vā
SA15dhkvadnu:760: virodhas tadā viruddho hetur iti. ataḥ pratijñā-virodho hetu-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:761: vā ity adoṣaḥ. tatra hetor udāharaṇaṃ nityaḥ śabda
SA15dhkvadnu:762: utpatti-dharmakatvād iti, pratijñā-virodhasya na asty ātmā iti,
SA15dhkvadnu:764: ity ādi, pratijñayā hetu-virodha-udāharaṇaṃ na asty eko
SA15dhkvadnu:767: yathoktaṃ prāk. anapekṣe ca kevale svataḥ pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:768: virodhe vivakṣite pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti hetu-grahaṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:769: asambaddham. na ca utpatti-dharmakatvān nityam ity
SA15dhkvadnu:770: atra api hetu-virodho yuktaḥ, pratijñayā hi hetor bādhane
SA15dhkvadnu:771: hetu-virodhaḥ. iha tu hetunā pratijñā bādhyata iti pratijñā-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:774: yad apy uktam etena pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodha-ādayo api
SA15dhkvadnu:775: vaktavyā bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyena iti tatra api pakṣīkṛta-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:776: viparyayavati dṛṣṭānte virodhaḥ syāt. viruddhe ca dṛṣṭānte
SA15dhkvadnu:778: viruddhas tadā hetv-ābhāsaḥ sādhāraṇāyām aprasādhite vā
SA15dhkvadnu:781: kaścid hetu-doṣo dṛṣṭānta-virodhaś ca pratijñayā iti cet, na,
SA15dhkvadnu:782: tad api saṃśaya-hetutva-anativṛtter dṛṣṭānta-virodho hi pratijñāyāḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:785: api hetor na avyabhicāra-dharmatā śakyā darśayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:787: tan na pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodho hetv-ābhāsān ativartate.
SA15dhkvadnu:788: ubhayathā api doṣo astv iti cet, na na hetu-doṣasya prāk
SA15dhkvadnu:791: hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ viruddhe dṛṣṭānte na sambhavati iti prāk
SA15dhkvadnu:792: prayuktasya hetor doṣeṇa parājaya iti na uttara-dṛṣṭānta-apekṣayā
SA15dhkvadnu:793: virodhaś cintām arhati. hetor api dṛṣṭānta-virodhe asādhāraṇatvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:794: viruddhatvaṃ vā vaidharmye yadi vṛttiḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:795: pramāṇa-virodhe tu hetoḥ, yathā na dahano agniḥ śaityād
SA15dhkvadnu:799: sarva ete sādhana-virodhā hetv-ābhāseṣv eva antarbhavanti
SA15dhkvadnu:801: yat tu viruddham uttaraṃ para-pakṣe sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:802: anaikāntika-codanā iti, tad asambaddham eva. yadi hi sva-siddhena
SA15dhkvadnu:804: tasya tat sva-pakṣa-viruddhaṃ na abhimatam iti virodha
SA15dhkvadnu:805: yujyeta. sa hi svayaṃ pratipanne gotve hetu-vṛtteḥ saṃśayāno
SA15dhkvadnu:806: apratipattim ātmanas tathā khyāpayati. sa ca hetuḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:808: anaikāntika eva prasādhite tu sāmarthye gotve
SA15dhkvadnu:809: avṛttyā hetor na saṃśaya eva sarva-saṃśaya-prakārāṇāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:813: saṃśaya-hetum eva āha iti. yat punar uktam ubhaya-pakṣa-sampratipannena
SA15dhkvadnu:814: vastunā anaikāntika-codanā iti, tatra apy avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:816: asamarthite anyatra api tulyam iti na ubhaya-siddha-itarayor anaikāntikatvair
SA15dhkvadnu:819: tad-abhidhānena eva uktā iti na pṛthag nigrahasthāneṣu uktā iti,
SA15dhkvadnu:820: tad apy avayava-antara-vādino ayuktam. yo avayava-antaraṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:821: dṛṣṭāntaṃ hetor āha, tasya na hetv-ābhāsa-uktyā dṛṣṭānta-ābhāsa-
SA15dhkvadnu:822: uktir vyāpyā tad-vacanena gamyamānasya tasmāt sādhana-antara-
SA15dhkvadnu:824: antarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntasya api hetāv antarbhāva iṣṭo bhavati,
SA15dhkvadnu:825: tathā ca na dṛṣṭāntaḥ pṛthak sādhana-avayavaḥ syād apṛthag-vṛtteḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:826: yo dṛṣṭānta-sādhyo arthas tasya hetāv antarbhāvād
SA15dhkvadnu:827: hetunā eva sādhita iti na dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthak kiṃcit sāmarthyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:828: api ca na kiṃcit pūrva-pakṣa-vādino hetv-ābhāsa-asaṃsparṣe
SA15dhkvadnu:829: nyāyyaṃ nigrahasthānam asti iti tat-sambandhīni sarvāṇy
SA15dhkvadnu:830: eva hetv-ābhāsa-vacanena eva uktāni iti na pṛthag vācyāni
SA15dhkvadnu:831: syuḥ. artha-antara-gamana-āder api hetor asāmarthya eva sambhavāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:832: na hi samarthe hetau sādhye ca siddhe artha-antara-
SA15dhkvadnu:833: gamanaṃ kaścid ārabhate asamarthasya mithyā-pravṛtter iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:835: yaḥ pratijñātam artham anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:837: pratiṣedhe kṛte ka evam āha anityaḥ śabda iti parityajati,
SA15dhkvadnu:839: atra api yady udbhāvite api hetor vyabhicāre na sa pakṣaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:840: parityajati, kiṃ na gṛhyeta. nigṛhīta eva hetv-ābhāsa-abhidhānād
SA15dhkvadnu:842: tasya tad eva adyaṃ nigrahasthānam iti kim anyair
SA15dhkvadnu:846: prapalāyitvaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam ity evam ādy api vācyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:847: syāt, tasmād etad apy asambaddham iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:848: aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetv-antaram.
SA15dhkvadnu:849: nidarśanam eka-prakṛti idaṃ vyaktaṃ parimāṇāt, mṛt-pūrvakāṇāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:852: ca dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti evaṃ pratyavasthita āha
SA15dhkvadnu:854: duḥkha-moha-samanvitaṃ hi idaṃ sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:856: prakṛtikatvam iti. tad idam aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:857: bruvato hetv-antaraṃ bhavati. sati ca hetv-antara-bhāve
SA15dhkvadnu:859: atra api pūrvasya eva hetor anaikāntikasya abhidhānān nigṛhīte
SA15dhkvadnu:861: hetum anaikāntikam uktvā datta-uttara-avasaraḥ, tena eva nigṛhyate
SA15dhkvadnu:866: prakṛtyāyāṃ kuryān nityaḥ śabdo asparśatvād iti hetuḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:867: hetuś ca nāma hinoter dhātos tu-śabde pratyaye kṛd-antaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:868: padam. padaṃ ca nāma-ākhyāta-upasarga-nipātā iti prastutya
SA15dhkvadnu:869: nāma-ādīni vyācaṣṭe, idam artha-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānam
SA15dhkvadnu:874: samarthane kartavye tad akṛtvā aparasya prasaṅgena aprasaṅgena
SA15dhkvadnu:876: sthānam uttara-vādino api doṣa-udbhāvana-mātrād aparasya upakṣepa
SA15dhkvadnu:881: idam apy asambaddham, na hi varṇa-krama-nirdeśād eva iṣṭa-
SA15dhkvadnu:882: artha-siddhāv ānarthakyam. yad eva kiṃcid asādhana-aṅgasya
SA15dhkvadnu:884: abhidheyasya abhāvāt niṣprayojanatvāc ca iti, prakāra-viśeṣa-upādānam
SA15dhkvadnu:886: vater upādānād adoṣa iti cet, syād etat, varṇa-krama-nirdeśavad
SA15dhkvadnu:887: iti vatir atra upāttaḥ so anyadā apy ananurūpaṃ gṛhnati ity
SA15dhkvadnu:888: adoṣa iti. na, artha-antara-āder nigrahasthānasya avacana-prasaṅgāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:889: evaṃ hi tā na pṛthag vācyā nirarthakena eva abhidhānāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:890: na sādhya-siddhāv anarthakaṃ nirarthakam, yasya na eva
SA15dhkvadnu:891: kaścid arthaḥ, tan nirarthakam iṣṭam iti cet, yasya kasyacid
SA15dhkvadnu:892: avādino api hi nirarthaka-abhidhāne kiṃ na nigraho nigraha-
SA15dhkvadnu:894: na, tasya iha aprastāvād iti cet, āyātam iha yo nirarthakaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:895: bravīti, tasya tena eva nigraha iti. tat tulyaṃ sarvasya asādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:896: aṅga-vādina iti. sa sarvo nirarthaka-abhidhāyy anena eva
SA15dhkvadnu:898: na ca varṇa-krama-nirdeśaḥ sarvatra nirarthakaḥ kvacit-
SA15dhkvadnu:899: prakaraṇe tasya api arthavattvāt. tasmād atra eva asya ānarthakyāt
SA15dhkvadnu:901: api ca atyalpam idam ucyate varṇa-krama-nirdeśo nigrahasthānam
SA15dhkvadnu:905: avijñāta-artham. yad vākyaṃ parṣadā prativādinā ca trir-abhihitaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:907: uccāritam ity evam ādinā kāraṇena, tad avijñāta-artham, asāmarthya-
SA15dhkvadnu:909: na idaṃ nirarthakād bhidyate. sa yadi prakṛta-artha-sambaddhaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:910: gamakam eva kuryāt, na asya-asāmarthyam, tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:911: jāḍyāt parṣad-ādayo na pratipadyanta iti na vidvān nigraham
SA15dhkvadnu:913: parṣat-prajñām aparikalpya vacanān nigraha-arha eva iti cet,
SA15dhkvadnu:914: nyāyavādino jāḍyād uktam ajānan kiṃ na prativādī nigṛhyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:915: jāḍyāt parṣad-āder avijñāta-pratipādana-asāmarthya iti vijetā na
SA15dhkvadnu:917: eva iti na pṛthag avijñāta-arthaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:919: anekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇa yogo
SA15dhkvadnu:920: na asti ity asambaddha-arthatā gṛhyate, tat samudāya-arthasya apāyād
SA15dhkvadnu:923: nirarthakāt pṛthag uktam nanv evam asambaddha-vākyam
SA15dhkvadnu:924: api pṛthag vācyaṃ syāt. na ubhaya-saṃgrahāt apārthakam,
SA15dhkvadnu:925: nirarthakasya api saṃgraha-prasaṅgāt. evaṃvidhāc ca viśeṣa-
SA15dhkvadnu:927: apy uktaḥ. na ca saṃgraha-nirdeśe kiṃcid doṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:928: prabhede vā guṇa-antaram iti yat kiṃcid etat.
SA15dhkvadnu:930: yathālakṣaṇam artha-vaśāt kramaḥ, tatra avayavānāṃ viparyayeṇa
SA15dhkvadnu:932: na, evam api siddher iti cet, na prayoga-apeta-śabda-tulyatvāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:933: yathā gaur ity asya padasya arthe goṇī iti prayujyamānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:934: padaṃ kakuda-ādimantam arthaṃ pratipādyati iti. na śabda-anvākhyānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:935: vyartham, anena padena go-śabdam eva pratipadyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:938: ca artham iti, tathā hi pūrvaṃ karma-upādīyate tataḥ karaṇaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:940: tad etad unmattasya unmatta-saṃvarṇanam iva prayoga-apeta-
SA15dhkvadnu:941: śabda-vad etad iti. yadi goṇī-śabdāt kakuda-ādimaty
SA15dhkvadnu:942: arthe pratītiḥ, śabda-anvākhyāna-prayatnena arthaṃ na paśyāmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:944: vyutpatty-artham anvākhyānam iti cet, nanu goṇī-śabdād api
SA15dhkvadnu:945: loke pratītir dṛṣṭā. satyaṃ dṛṣṭā, na tu sākṣād ity uktam.
SA15dhkvadnu:946: uktam etan na punar yuktam, strī-śūdrāṇām ubhaya-pratīter
SA15dhkvadnu:947: abhāvāt. yaḥ khalu ubhayaṃ vetti śabdam apaśabdaṃ ca, sa
SA15dhkvadnu:948: evaṃ pratipadyate. yas tu nakka-śabdaṃ mukka-śabdam eva
SA15dhkvadnu:949: vā vetti, na nāsā-śabdam, sa katham apaśabdāc śabdaṃ pratipadya
SA15dhkvadnu:950: tato arthaṃ pratipadyeta. dṛṣṭā ca anubhaya-vedino api
SA15dhkvadnu:952: arthe asamarthasya śabde api pratīti-janana-asāmarthyāc ca.
SA15dhkvadnu:953: na hy arthe api vācakatvaṃ nāma anyad eva tad-viṣaya-pratīti-
SA15dhkvadnu:954: jananāt. apaśabdaś cec śabde pratītiṃ janayet, artha eva
SA15dhkvadnu:955: kiṃ na janayati. na hy etasya arthāt kiṃcid bhayaṃ paśyāmo
SA15dhkvadnu:957: akṛta-samayasya śabde apy apratīti-jananāc ca. na hy
SA15dhkvadnu:958: ayam apaśabdaḥ śabde api svabhāvataḥ pratītiṃ janayaty
SA15dhkvadnu:959: adarśanāt, samayata eva tu janayet. samaya-vaśād vartamāno
SA15dhkvadnu:960: artha eva kiṃ na pravartate. evaṃ hi pratipatti-paraṃparā-
SA15dhkvadnu:963: apaśabdair eva bahulaṃ vyutpadyamānā loke dṛśyante
SA15dhkvadnu:966: ko ayaṃ śabdānāṃ saṃskāraḥ. na hy eṣāṃ prajñā-bāhu-śruty-
SA15dhkvadnu:967: ādikaṃ saṃskāraṃ paśyāmaḥ, na apy eṣām ekāntena
SA15dhkvadnu:968: śravyatā, na apy artha-pratyāyane kaścid atiśayaḥ. na
SA15dhkvadnu:970: apy adharma-utpatteḥ, anyebhyo api viparyaye dharma-utpatteḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:972: na ca evaṃvidhān āgamān ādriyante yuktijñāḥ. na ca
SA15dhkvadnu:974: naraka-pātam iti bruvāṇasya kasyacin mukhaṃ vakrībhavati.
SA15dhkvadnu:975: tasmān na saṃskṛto nāma kaścic śabdaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:976: śiṣṭa-prayogaḥ saṃskāra iti cet, ke śiṣṭāḥ. ye vidita-vedyatā-
SA15dhkvadnu:977: ādi-guṇa-yuktāḥ. kaḥ punar eṣāṃ guṇa-utkarṣa-anapekṣo alīka-nirbandhaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:978: yat te amūn eva śabdān prayuñjate, na aparān. na
SA15dhkvadnu:979: ca atra kaścic śabde parokṣaḥ sākṣī, yata idam evaṃ niścinumaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:980: prayuñjate nāma śiṣṭāḥ. nanv evaṃ vayaṃ guṇa-atiśayam
SA15dhkvadnu:984: saty api guṇa atiśaye na karaṇīya eva anvākhyāne yatnaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:987: kiṃcil lakṣaṇam asti, atha ca sampradāya-vaśāt tā lokas
SA15dhkvadnu:988: tathā eva pratipadyate tāsāṃ ca prayoga-bhraṃśam tathā
SA15dhkvadnu:989: saṃskṛtānāṃ śabdānāṃ pratītir bhaviṣyati iti. jaḍa-pravṛttir
SA15dhkvadnu:990: eva eṣā, yā śabdānāṃ lakṣaṇe pravṛttiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:991: avayava-viparyaye api yadi teṣāṃ vacanānāṃ sambandha-pratītir, na
SA15dhkvadnu:992: viparyayo na apy artha-apratītiḥ sāmarthyāt. na hy atra kaścit
SA15dhkvadnu:993: samayaḥ pratyāyana-aviśeṣe apy evam eva avayavāḥ prayoktavyā
SA15dhkvadnu:995: sa eva teṣāṃ kramo yathāvasthitebhyo artha-pratītir bhavati iti
SA15dhkvadnu:996: na viparyayāt pratītiḥ, tata ānupūrvī-pratipattyā pratītir
SA15dhkvadnu:998: yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ kaścit sambandho jāyate, idam iha
SA15dhkvadnu:999: sambadhyata iti teṣu vidita-sambandheṣu kaḥ kasya pūrvo
SA15dhkvadnu:1000: aparo vā kramaḥ, yena krameṇa vyavasthāpyeran. sambandha-
SA15dhkvadnu:1001: pratipattau sa eva teṣāṃ kramaḥ, yo yathāvasthitānāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1002: sambandhaḥ pratīyate. na hi vākyeṣu padānāṃ krama-niyamaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:1003: kaścit, yathā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, puruṣo rajña iti. yāvadbhiḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:1004: padair artha-parisamāptiḥ tadā ekaṃ vākyam, yathā
SA15dhkvadnu:1005: devadatta gām ānaya kṛṣṇām iti. atra padānāṃ yathākāmaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1006: prayoge api na artha-pratītau viśeṣa iti kaścit krama-abhiniveśaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:1008: pratītir bhaviṣyati iti pratīyamāna-arthasya ca śabdasya prayoge
SA15dhkvadnu:1010: dharmiṇi bhāvaḥ pradarśyeta, dharmiṇi bhāvaṃ pradarśya
SA15dhkvadnu:1011: sambandhaḥ pradarśyeta iti na niyamaḥ kaścid ubhayathā api
SA15dhkvadnu:1012: pratīty-utpatter ity uktam. apratīyamāna-sambandheṣu ca padeṣu
SA15dhkvadnu:1013: na tebhya ānupūrvyā api pratītir iti na idam apārthakād
SA15dhkvadnu:1014: bhidyata iti; na aprāptakālaṃ pṛthag vācyaṃ syād iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1015: hīnam anyatamena apy avayavena nyūnam. yasmin vākye
SA15dhkvadnu:1016: pratijñā-ādīnām anyatamo avayavo na bhavati, tad vākyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1018: na pratijñā-nyūnaṃ hīnaṃ tad-abhāve pratīti-bhāvād iti
SA15dhkvadnu:1019: pratipāditam. hīnam eva tat nyūnatāyām api nigrahād ity
SA15dhkvadnu:1020: aparaḥ. yaḥ pratīyamāna-artham anarthakaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte,
SA15dhkvadnu:1021: sa nigraham arhet. na artha-upasaṃhitasya abhidhātā ity
SA15dhkvadnu:1022: asamīkṣita-abhidhānam etat. ata eva ca pratijñāyā na sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:1025: ānarthakyam iti tad etan niyama-abhyupagame veditavyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1028: tu na kaścid doṣo niyama-abhāvād iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1030: śabda-punaruktam anityaḥ śabdo anityaḥ śabda iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1033: atra na śabda-punaruktaṃ pṛthag vācyam artha-punarukta-
SA15dhkvadnu:1034: vacanena eva gatatvāt. na hy artha-bhede śabda-sāmye api
SA15dhkvadnu:1036: hasati hasati svāminy uccai rudaty atiroditi /
SA15dhkvadnu:1040: yathā vā yad yasmin bhavati bhavati, na bhavati na bhavati,
SA15dhkvadnu:1041: tat tasya kāryam, itarat kāraṇam iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1044: artha-punaruktena eva gata-arthatvāt na pṛthag vācyam. ayam
SA15dhkvadnu:1045: api niyata-sādhana vākya eva doṣo vaktavyaḥ, na vistara-kathāyām,
SA15dhkvadnu:1047: śaṅkayā sākṣi-prabhṛtīnāṃ punaḥ punar brūyāt, api na tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:1049: na aviṣayatvād iti cet, na ayaṃ gurur na śiṣya iti na yatnataḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:1050: pratipādaniyaḥ, yena punaḥ punar ucyata iti punarvacane
SA15dhkvadnu:1051: nigraha eva iti cet, na, sākṣiṇāṃ yatnena pratipādyatvāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:1055: na ca idam adhikād bhidyata iti na pṛthag vācyam. viniyata-
SA15dhkvadnu:1056: pada-prayoge hi sādhana-vākye ādhikya-doṣa iti punarvacane
SA15dhkvadnu:1062: doṣa iti ādhikya-punarvacanayos tulya-doṣa iti saṃgraha-
SA15dhkvadnu:1063: vacanaṃ nyāyyam, doṣa-abhāvād eva guṇa-abhāvāt, evaṃprakārānāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1064: bhedānāṃ vacane ca atiprasaṅgād ity uktam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1065: paryāya-śabda-kalpo hy aparo hetur eka-hetu-pratipādite viṣaye
SA15dhkvadnu:1068: yat punar uktam, anuvāde tv apunaruktaṃ śabda-abhyāsād
SA15dhkvadnu:1070: punarvacanaṃ nigamanam iti, pratijñāyā eva gamyamāna-arthāyā
SA15dhkvadnu:1071: vacanaṃ punarvacanam, kiṃ punar asyāḥ punarvacanam
SA15dhkvadnu:1078: uttareṇa avasānān na idaṃ nigrahasthānam iti cet, syād
SA15dhkvadnu:1079: etat, uttareṇa guṇa-doṣavatā mūḍha-amūḍhatvaṃ gamyata iti
SA15dhkvadnu:1080: kiṃ punar-uccāritena. asti hi kaścid uttare samartho na pratyuccāraṇe,
SA15dhkvadnu:1081: na asau tāvatā nigraham arhed iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1082: na, uttara-viṣaya-aparijñānāt. yady ayaṃ na pratyuccārayati,
SA15dhkvadnu:1083: nirviṣayam uttaraṃ prasajyeta. atha uttaraṃ bravīti,
SA15dhkvadnu:1084: kathaṃ na uccārayati. tad idaṃ vyāhatam ucyate, na uccārayaty
SA15dhkvadnu:1085: uttaraṃ ca bravīti iti. apratijñānāc ca. na ca idaṃ pratijñāyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:1087: abhidhātavyam iti, api tu yathākathaṃcid uttaraṃ vācyam,
SA15dhkvadnu:1088: uttaraṃ ca āśraya-abhāve ayuktam iti, yuktam apratyuccāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1093: arthān upakṣipya kathāṃ vistārayet, tac ca sarvaṃ yadā
SA15dhkvadnu:1094: na anuvaktuṃ śaknuyāt, kas tasya vivāda-āśraya-artha-mātra-uttara-
SA15dhkvadnu:1100: upakṣepaḥ, tad avaśyaṃ sādhana-aṅga-viṣayatvād dūṣaṇena upadarśyata
SA15dhkvadnu:1101: eva. tatra api na sarvaṃ prāg anukrameṇa uccāritavyam,
SA15dhkvadnu:1102: paścād dūṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ dvir uccāraṇa-prasaṅgāt. dūṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:1104: ghoṣaṇaṃ vyartham iti, na kāryam eva dūṣayatā asya ayaṃ doṣa
SA15dhkvadnu:1106: kriyata eva. na hi sarva-viṣaya-upadarśanaṃ kṛtvā yugapad
SA15dhkvadnu:1107: doṣaḥ śakyate abhidhātum, pratyarthaṃ doṣa-bhedāt. tasmād
SA15dhkvadnu:1108: yaṃ padārthaṃ dūṣayati, sa eva tad-dūṣaṇa-viṣayas tadā
SA15dhkvadnu:1109: pradarśanīyo na aparaḥ, tad-dūṣaṇe apara-upadarśanasya asambhavāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:1110: tasmin dūṣite punar anyo artho apara-doṣa-viṣaya ity
SA15dhkvadnu:1111: ayam anubhāṣaṇe dūṣaṇe ca nyāyaḥ. sakṛt-sarva-anubhāṣaṇe
SA15dhkvadnu:1112: api doṣa-vacana-kāle punar viṣayaḥ pradarśanīya eva, apradarśite
SA15dhkvadnu:1113: doṣasya vaktum aśakyatvāt. tathā ca dvir-anubhāṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1114: kṛtaṃ syāt. tatra prathamaṃ sarva-anukrama-anubhāṣaṇaṃ niṣprayojanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1115: dūṣaṇa-vādinā dūṣaṇe vaktavye yan na tatra upayujyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:1116: tasya abhidhānam adoṣa-udbhāvanaṃ dvir-uktiś ca iti
SA15dhkvadnu:1118: tathā astv iti cet, syād etat, uktaṃ etad artha-antaraṃ nigrahasthānam
SA15dhkvadnu:1119: iti. tatra sādhane yataḥ kutaścit prasaṅga-ādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:1122: na prasajyate. na api tat tasya anubhāṣaṇīyam, na ca idam apy
SA15dhkvadnu:1123: asmābhir anujñāyate, sarvaṃ prāk sakṛd vaktavyaṃ paścād
SA15dhkvadnu:1124: dūṣaṇam iti, kiṃ tu dūṣayatā avaśyaṃ viṣayo darśanīyo
SA15dhkvadnu:1126: evaṃ tarhi na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag nigrahasthānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1127: vācyam apratibhayā gatatvāt, uttarasya hy apratipattir
SA15dhkvadnu:1128: apratibhā. na ca uttara-viṣayam apradarśayann uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1132: eva, gavi vihitam iva sāsnā-ādimattvaṃ bāhuleye api. tasmād
SA15dhkvadnu:1133: apratibhā eva nigraha-adhikaraṇatvena vācyā, na ananubhāṣaṇam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1134: kaś ca ayaṃ samaya-niyamas trir-abhihitasya ananubhāṣaṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:1135: iti. yadi tāvat para-pratipādana-arthā pravṛttiḥ, kiṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1136: trir abhidhīyeta. tathā tathā sa grāhaṇīyaḥ, yathā asya pratipattir
SA15dhkvadnu:1137: bhavati. atha para-upatāpana-arthā, tadā api kiṃ trir
SA15dhkvadnu:1138: abhidhīyate, sākṣiṇāṃ karṇe nivedya prativādī kaṣṭa-pratīta-
SA15dhkvadnu:1140: vimūḍhas tūṣṇīṃbhavati. na hi para-upatāpana-krame kaścin
SA15dhkvadnu:1142: trir-abhidhānaṃ vā vidhīyate. na ca para-upatāpāya santaḥ pravartante
SA15dhkvadnu:1143: śāstrāṇi vā praṇīyante ity ado vaktavyam. tasmāt
SA15dhkvadnu:1144: tāvad vaktavyam, yāvad anena na gṛhītam, na trir eva. agrahaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:1147: avijñātaṃ ca ajñānam. vijñātaṃ parṣadā prativādinā yad
SA15dhkvadnu:1148: avijñātam, tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam. arthe khalv
SA15dhkvadnu:1149: avijñāte na tasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1150: etad apy ananubhāṣaṇa-vad apratibhayā eva gamyatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:1152: pratipattir aśakyā iti anuttara-pratipattyā eva nigrahasthānatvam
SA15dhkvadnu:1156: ca uttaraṃ brūyād iti viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-jñānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1158: artho hi na anubhāṣet. ananubhāṣamāṇo viṣayam
SA15dhkvadnu:1159: apradarśya-uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śaknuyād iti uttaraṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1162: tad-abhāve pratipattir bhavaty eva iti tayoḥ pṛthag vacane
SA15dhkvadnu:1163: apratibhāyāḥ ko viṣaya iti vaktavyam, nirviṣayatvād avācyā
SA15dhkvadnu:1165: na uttara-ajñānam ajñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi viṣaya-ajñānam, ajñāte
SA15dhkvadnu:1166: hi viṣaye uttara-ajñānāt tan na pratipadyeta iti asti viṣayo apratibhāyā
SA15dhkvadnu:1167: iti cet, evaṃ tarhy ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nirviṣayam,
SA15dhkvadnu:1168: ajñānena ākṣepāt. na hi viṣayaṃ samyak pratipadyamānaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:1169: kaścin na anubhāṣeta iti na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag vācyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1170: uttara-ajñānasya ca ākṣepāt. viṣaya-ajñānena uttara-ajñānam apy
SA15dhkvadnu:1171: ākṣiptam eva. na hi viṣayam ajānann uttaraṃ jānāti iti na eva apratibhāyā
SA15dhkvadnu:1173: jñāte api viṣaye punar uttara-ajñānam apratibhāyā viṣaya
SA15dhkvadnu:1174: iti cet, evaṃ tarhi viṣaya-uttara-ajñānayor api prabhedān nigrahasthāna-
SA15dhkvadnu:1175: antarāṇi vācyāni. yathā ajñānasya viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-
SA15dhkvadnu:1176: ajñānam iti prabhedād asaty api guṇa-atiśaye nigrahasthāna-
SA15dhkvadnu:1177: antara-vyavasthā kriyate, tathā ajñānayor api sarvā-jñāna-ardha-
SA15dhkvadnu:1178: ajñānam ity ādi-prabhedān nigrahasthāna-antarāṇi kiṃ na ucyante.
SA15dhkvadnu:1179: na ca ubhayasya apy ajñānasya saṃgraha-vacane kaścid
SA15dhkvadnu:1180: doṣaḥ, guṇas tu syād iti saṃgraha-vacanaṃ nyāyyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1182: pṛthag-vacanam. api ca na pūrva-uttara-vādino hetv-ābhāsā-pratibhābhyām
SA15dhkvadnu:1184: vacanena eva sarvam uktam iti. tad-ubhaya-ākṣipteṣu prabhedeṣu
SA15dhkvadnu:1188: uttaraṃ yadā na pratipadyate, tadā nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:1193: kārya-vyāsaṅgāt kathā-vicchedo vikṣepaḥ. yat kiṃcit kartavyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1194: vyāsajya kathāṃ vicchinatti, idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1195: parihīyate, asminn avasite paścāt kariṣyāmi, pratiśyāyakalā
SA15dhkvadnu:1196: me kaṇṭhaṃ kṣiṇoty evam-ādinā kathāṃ vicchinatti, sa vikṣepo
SA15dhkvadnu:1199: idam apy yadi pūrvapakṣa-vādī kuryād vyāja-upakṣepa-mātreṇa,
SA15dhkvadnu:1202: vikṣepaḥ syāt. tathā ca idam artha-antara-gamana eva antarbhaved
SA15dhkvadnu:1205: na bhidyate. atiprasaṅgaś ca evaṃprakārāṇām asambaddha-
SA15dhkvadnu:1207: vyavasthāpane proktaḥ. atha uttarapakṣa-vādy evaṃ vikṣipet,
SA15dhkvadnu:1208: tasya api sādhana-anantaram uttare pratipattavye tad-apratipattyā
SA15dhkvadnu:1210: nanu na avaśyaṃ sādhana-dūṣaṇābhyām eva sarvasya pratipattir,
SA15dhkvadnu:1212: hetv-ābhāseṣv apratibhāyāṃ vā antarbhavet. bhavati hi anibaddhena
SA15dhkvadnu:1213: api kathā-prapañcena vivāda iti, na, asambhavāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:1214: ekatra adhikaraṇe viruddha-abhyupagamayor vivādaḥ syāt, aviruddha-
SA15dhkvadnu:1220: anyathā pareṣām apratipatteḥ, apareṇa ca tat-sambandhi dūṣaṇam.
SA15dhkvadnu:1223: dvayaṃ na atipatati. etena eva vitaṇḍā pratyukta-abhyupagama-
SA15dhkvadnu:1225: yadā tarhy abhyupagamya vādaṃ viphalatayā na kiṃcid
SA15dhkvadnu:1226: vakti, anyad vā yat kiṃcit pralapati, tadā kathaṃ hetv-ābhāsa-
SA15dhkvadnu:1228: anabhidhāna anya-abhidhānayor api parājaya eva ity uktam
SA15dhkvadnu:1230: punaruktasya ca pratijñā-āder vacanasya ca nigrahasthānatvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1236: yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣam anuddhṛtya, bhavato
SA15dhkvadnu:1237: apy ayaṃ doṣa iti bravīti, yathā bhavāṃś cauraḥ puruṣatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:1238: ity ukte sa taṃ pratibrūyād, bhavān api iti, sa sva-pakṣe doṣa-abhyupagamāt
SA15dhkvadnu:1241: atra api yadi puruṣatvāc cauro bhavān api syāt, na ca bhavatā
SA15dhkvadnu:1242: ātmā evam iṣṭaḥ, tasmān na ayaṃ caurya-hetur iti yady
SA15dhkvadnu:1243: ayam abhiprāyaḥ, tadā na kaścid doṣaḥ, anabhimate tad-ātmani
SA15dhkvadnu:1245: prasaṅgam antareṇa āñjasena eva kiṃ na vyabhicārita iti
SA15dhkvadnu:1246: cet, yat kiṃcid etat, santi hy evaṃprakārā api vyavahārā loka
SA15dhkvadnu:1247: iti. atha tad upakṣepam abhyupagacchaty eva, tadā apy
SA15dhkvadnu:1248: asāv uttara-apratipattyā eva tat-sādhane nigraha-arhaḥ, na aparatra
SA15dhkvadnu:1250: eva uttara-apratipattir iti tāvatā eva pūrvam āpanna-nigrahasya
SA15dhkvadnu:1254: nigraha-prāpto asi ity ananuyogaḥ. etac ca kasya parājaya
SA15dhkvadnu:1255: ity anuyuktayā parṣadā vaktavyam, na khalu nigraha-prāptaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:1257: atra api yadi sādhana-vādinaṃ nigraha-prāptam uttara-vādī
SA15dhkvadnu:1258: na paryanuyuṅkte, apratibhā eva asya uttara-apratipatter iti na
SA15dhkvadnu:1260: punar na dvayor ekasya api atra jaya-parājayau, sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:1262: atha kaṃcid doṣam udbhāvayati, kaṃcin na, na tadā
SA15dhkvadnu:1264: arhati eva, sarvasya sato doṣasya anudbhāvanād iti cet, na
SA15dhkvadnu:1265: santa iti kṛtvā sarve doṣā avaśyaṃ vaktavyā avacane vā
SA15dhkvadnu:1267: yathā ekasya artha-asya aneka-sādhana-sadbhāve apy ekena eva
SA15dhkvadnu:1268: tat-siddher na sarva-upādānam iti na doṣam udbhāvayann eva aparasya
SA15dhkvadnu:1271: na nigṛhṇāti, tadā tayor nyāyena na ekasya api pūrvavaj
SA15dhkvadnu:1276: evam api na paryanuyojya-upekṣaṇaṃ nāma parājaya-adhikaraṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:1280: asi iti bruvan niranuyojya-anuyogān nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:1281: atra api yadi tat-sādhana-vādinam abhūtair doṣair uttara-
SA15dhkvadnu:1282: vādy abhiyuñjīta, so asthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya abhiyokta-
SA15dhkvadnu:1283: udbhāvayitā na bhavati. tathā ca bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvana-lakṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:1285: apratibhayā eva nigṛhīta iti na idam ato nigrahasthāna-antaram.
SA15dhkvadnu:1287: aparo doṣa-ābhāsa-vacanena abhiyuñjīta, tasya tena bhūta-
SA15dhkvadnu:1288: doṣatve pratipādite sādhana-ābhāsa-vacanena eva nigṛhīta iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1289: evam api na idaṃ hetv-ābhāsebhyo bhidyate. avaśyaṃ hi
SA15dhkvadnu:1295: vijñeyaḥ. yathā na sato vināśaḥ, na asad utpadyata iti siddhāntam
SA15dhkvadnu:1298: ādīnāṃ dṛṣṭam eka-prakṛtikatvam, tathā ca ayaṃ vyakta-
SA15dhkvadnu:1300: eka-prakṛtir iti. sa evam uktavān paryanuyujyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:1301: atha prakṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam iti. yasya avasthitasya
SA15dhkvadnu:1303: sā prakṛtiḥ. yat tad dharma-antaram, sa vikāra iti. so ayaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1305: khalv anena na asad āvirbhavati, na sat tirobhavati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1306: sad-asatoś ca tirobhāva-āvirbhāvāv antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛtty-
SA15dhkvadnu:1307: uparamaḥ pravṛttir vā iti evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sata
SA15dhkvadnu:1308: ātma-hānam asataś ca ātma-lābham abhyupaiti, apasiddhānto
SA15dhkvadnu:1309: bhavati atha na abhyupaiti, pakṣo asya na sidhyati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:1310: iha api na kaścid aniyamāt kathā-prasaṅgaḥ yat tena upagatan
SA15dhkvadnu:1311: na asad utpadyate, na sad vinaśyati iti tasya samarthanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:1312: idam uktam eka-prakṛtikam idaṃ vyaktam anvaya-darśanād
SA15dhkvadnu:1313: iti. tatra ekā prakṛtiḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohaḥ. tad-avibhakta-
SA15dhkvadnu:1317: vināśāv iti siddhaṃ bhavati. atra tad-uktasya hetor doṣam
SA15dhkvadnu:1320: tatra idaṃ syād vācyam, vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛtti-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkvadnu:1321: dharmakam, na tathā sukha-ādayaḥ. vyaktasya sukha-ādy-anvaye
SA15dhkvadnu:1324: virodhād iti. sukha-ādy-anvaya-darśanād ity asiddho hetur
SA15dhkvadnu:1325: iti. evaṃ hi tasya sādhana-doṣa-udbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito
SA15dhkvadnu:1326: bhavati. so anupasaṃhṛtya sādhana-doṣaṃ kathāṃ pratānayan
SA15dhkvadnu:1328: ayam eva doṣo anena prakaraṇena ucyata iti cet, eṣa naimittikāṇāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1329: viṣayaḥ, na lokaḥ śabdair apratipāditam arthaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1330: pratipattuṃ samartha iti. sa eva ayaṃ bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyo
SA15dhkvadnu:1331: atra api. yathoktena nyāyena pūrvakasya asādhana-aṅgasya asiddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:1332: hetor abhidhānād eva nigrahaḥ, na api aniyamāt
SA15dhkvadnu:1333: kathā-prasaṅgād iti. idam api hetv-ābhāseṣv antarbhāvān na
SA15dhkvadnu:1335: hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathoktāḥ. hetv-ābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni.
SA15dhkvadnu:1338: ity ata āha yathokta-hetv-ābhāsa-lakṣaṇena eva nigrahasthāna-
SA15dhkvadnu:1340: atra api yathoktaṃ kṛtvā cintyam eva, kiṃ te yathālakṣita-prabhedās
SA15dhkvadnu:1341: tathā eva, āhosvid anyathā iti. tat tu cintyamānam
SA15dhkvadnu:1342: iha atiprasajyata iti na pratanyate. hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathānyāyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1346: tattva-ālokaṃ timirayati taṃ durvidagdho jano ayaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1347: tasmād yatnaḥ kṛta iha mayā tat-samujjvālanāya //3//
